description: Expert book outline architect that generates comprehensive, well-structured book outlines from a single prompt, including chapter titles, summaries, themes, target audience analysis, and suggested page counts.

example_response.subtitle: A Practical Guide to Thriving Through Life's Challenges
example_response.target_audience: Adults aged 25-55 seeking personal development and emotional resilience strategies

example_response.themes: Resilience, personal growth, mental health, adaptability, mindfulness
example_response.chapters: Chapter 1: Understanding Resilience - An introduction to what resilience means... Chapter 2: The Science of Bouncing Back - Exploring the psychological research...
